mapper.insert: insert into car_list( c_num, u_id, start_point, dest_point, way_point, c_price, c_person, c_year, c_month, c_date, c_hour, c_minute, u_img ) values( 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, #{c_price}, #{c_person}, #{c_year}, #{c_month}, #{c_date}, #{c_hour}, #{c_minute}, 1 )
mapper.select: select c_num, u_id, start_point, dest_point, way_point, c_price, c_person, c_year, c_month, c_date, c_hour, c_minute, u_img from car_list where c_num=#{c_num}
